CutSceneText.Text: An Artefact is a relic from the Tower of Eternity.
Each Artefact possesses a different power,
and no one knows exactly how much each Artefact can do.
So far, we can tap only a fraction of their power.
To activate the Artefact, you need an Activation Stone.
We have discovered several kinds of Artefacts:
some can obliterate a multitude of enemies,
while others heal your allies' wounds.
Because these weapons can reverse the tide of battle instantly,
it is crucial to capture as many Artefacts as possible.
A powerful Protector guards each artefact,
so to seize its power, you must first subdue the Protector.
